title: Wicked Thing
lyrics:
I heard you in my ghosts
Thought I could control you
I knew you'd pull me away
Start feeling like a monster
What is this prison that I am in?
Thought it was purely that you'd fill me

And this faith I need to honour

I needed it

I need you

What?!

Ain't it a wicked thing

To want something too much

A golden statue

You own yet it stole love

And it feels right to know that I can live without ya

Does it feel right to know that I can live without ya?

No no no no

Wicked thing

Oh oh oh

I want to give in to you

Oh oh oh

You have a power

To get in my head

But you're like a banquet

And I'm overfed

Does it feel right to know that I can live without ya?

Does it feel right to know that I can live without ya?

No no no

I can live without you

I can live without you

I can live without you

I-I-I-I-I can live without you

I can live without you

I can live without you

I-I-I-I-I

Oh wicked thing

Oh oh oh

I want to give in to you

Oh oh oh

Oh wicked thing

Oh oh oh

I want to give in to you

Oh oh oh

I can live without you

I can live without you

I-I-I-I-I can live without you

I can live without you

I can live without you

I-I-I-I-I

Oh wicked thing

Oh oh oh

Oh wicked thing

Oh oh oh
